i.d: The RIC for this CDS quote.
The ISO 3 currency code for this CDS quote.
The Quote level short name for this CDS RIC.
Set to Y if this is the primary CDS RIC for the reference entity N otherwise.
Y if the RIC ends with =, N otherwise.
The code of the price contributor of this CDS quote.
The Short Name of the price contributor of this CDS quote.
The type of CDS e.g. C = Credit, L = Loan, P = Preferred, S = Structured Finance, O = Other.
Y if this is an Index, N otherwise. So for Single Names this will be N.
Y if this is an Index Tranche, N otherwise. Always N for non-indices.
The RCS asset class code for this contract. Not populated for indices.
The RIC ROOT of this CDS contract.
The tenor (or term) of this CDS contract.
The seniority code for this CDS contract.
The doc clause (restructuring clause) for this CDS contract.
The payment frequency for this CDS contract.
Set to Y if this is a 'convention' contract, N otherwise.
The ORG_ID for the organisation associated with this CDS quote.
The ORG_ID of the immediate parent of this organisation. Will be null if the organisation has no immediate parent. Not populated for indices.
The ORG_ID of the ultimate parent of this quote's reference entity.
The max-20-char Short Name for the organisation associated with this CDS quote.
The Reuters Entity Code for the Reference Entity associated with this CDS quote.
The TICKER for the Reference Entity associated with this CDS quote.
The primary equity RIC for the organisation.
The Fixed Income ORGANISATION_ID for this reference entity.
The ISO 2-character code for the reference entity’s country of HQ.
The industry sector code (from the 'Reuters Business Sector Schema' classification scheme) for this organisation. Not populated for indices.
The ORG_ID of the reference entity.

i.d: The RED9 code which uniquely identifies the pair. Also known as the pair clip.
Indicates the role of the reference entity in respect of this obligation. I=Issuer, G=Guarantor.
Y if this is the preferred pair for this entity and pair type, N otherwise.
The RED6 code for the reference entity in this pair.
The ORG_ID of the reference entity that is acting as the issuer/guarantor.
The ORGANISATION_ID of the reference entity.
The EJV Party ID for the associated reference entity.
The (Thomson Reuters maintained) ISIN code of the reference obligation.
The (Thomson Reuters maintained) CUSIP code of the reference obligation.
The TI_ID of the reference obligation.
The EJV asset_id for the reference obligation.
The seniority of the bond, expressed as one of the CDS seniority levels.
Markit-supplied obligation currency code.
Markit-supplied coupon of an obligation or spread of a Floating Rate Note (FRN). For example, one percent (1%) is shown as 0.01.
Markit-supplied bond coupon type - Fixed, Float or Struc.
Markit-supplied current coupon of an obligation or spread of a Floating Rate Note (FRN).
Markit-supplied flag indicating if this is a convertible bond.
Markit-supplied flag indicating if this is a perpetual bond.
Markit-supplied maturity date.
Markit-supplied obligation name.
Markit-supplied seniority (also referred to as tier).
